titles: A proclamation for putting in execution the law against importation and selling of foreign buttons, and prohibiting all foreign buttons whatsoever James R.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.
publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At head of title: By the King, a proclamation.
At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall the eighteenth day of November.
keywords: Buttons --  Commerce --  Law and legislation --  Great Britain.
